title: 觸發
author: 超級寶寶
txt_content:
要用哪哪個才能讓玩家以右鍵
觸發事件?

replies.author: 桃渊林
replies.txt_content:
這個很多
PlayerInteractEvent：與方塊交互時觸發
PlayerInteractEntityEvent:與實體交互時觸發
PlayerInteractAtEntityEvent！玩家以實體的身份交互時觸發，這個可能我理解錯誤了

replies.author: 桃渊林
replies.txt_content:
對了，這裏有3個鏈接可能對你有用
https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadoc ... tAtEntityEvent.html
https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadoc ... actEntityEvent.html
https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadoc ... rInteractEvent.html
